titleStmt.title: Englands monethly observations and predictions, for the yeare of our blessed Saviour, 1653. Fore-told by those two famous astrologers of our age, Mr. William Lilly, and Mr. Culpeper. The tune is. Faire angel of England.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.
Culpepper, Nathanael, 17/18th cent.

notesStmt.note: Author and date of publication suggested by Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse: "What learned astrologers writeth this yeare,".
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
